    I

    main.IndestructibleTile - Class in Unnamed Package
    The main.IndestructibleTile class represents a permanent wall or barrier that cannot be destroyed by bombs and never becomes walkable.
    main.IndestructibleTile(int, int) - Constructor for class main.IndestructibleTile
    Constructs an indestructible tile at the specified board position.
    initialTurnsTilExplosion - Variable in class object.Bomb
    The initial countdown value restored when the bomb is activated.
    isValidated(int, int, main.GameBoard) - Method in class main.Hero
    Validates whether a movement to a given tile is within the bounds of the board and whether that tile is walkable.
    isWalkable() - Method in class main.DestructibleTile
    Returns whether this tile can currently be walked on.
    isWalkable() - Method in class main.IndestructibleTile
    Returns whether this tile can currently be walked on.
    isWalkable() - Method in class main.Tile
    Indicates whether this tile can be walked on by the main.Hero.
    isWalkable() - Method in class main.WalkableTile
    Indicates whether this tile can be walked on by the main.Hero.
